episodes.title: The Abominable Bride
episodes.plot: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson find themselves in 1890s London in this Christmas special.

episodes.title: The Six Thatchers
episodes.plot: Sherlock takes on the case of finding out who is going around and smashing six unique head statues of late Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher.

episodes.title: The Lying Detective
episodes.plot: Sherlock goes up against the powerful and seemingly unassailable Culverton Smith - a man with a very dark secret indeed.

episodes.title: The Final Problem
episodes.plot: A dark secret in the Holmes family rears its head with a vengeance, putting Sherlock and friends through a series of sick, manipulative psychological and potentially fatal games.
